actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to authorize the recovery of damages by indirect purchasers injured in their business or property by reason of anything forbidden in the antitrust laws, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Clayton Act Amendments - Amends the Clayton Act to entitle indirect purchasers to sue for treble and actual damages when injured in their business or property by reason of any action forbidden by the antitrust laws.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the recovery of damages by indirect purchasers injured in their business or property by reason of anything forbidden in the antitrust laws, and for other purposes.
